title: Kundan Studded Pachala Mohini Butta - Exquisite Emerald Earrings
materials: Round Brilliant Cut Diamonds (వజ్రాలు) - SI Clarity
features: Floral motif with intricate Kundan setting, emeralds haloed by shimmering diamonds, a single central ruby adding a touch of royalty. The geometric lattice work adds a modern twist to this otherwise classic design.
colors: Predominantly gold with vibrant green from the emeralds
occasions: festive occasions like Ugadi and Sankranthi
సాంప్రదాయ వేడుకలు). Can also be styled with modern attire for a touch of ethnic elegance.
description: A harmonious blend of tradition and contemporary design. The Zambian emeralds are carefully selected for their rich color and brilliance. The handcrafted Kundan work ensures heirloom quality and lasting beauty. These Mohini Butta earrings are a statement piece that will add a touch of regal grace to any outfit. The intricate design symbolizes prosperity and good fortune, making them a meaningful and cherished gift.
